item.title: AWS Security Groups Inbound & Outbound Traffic
item.description: Did you know AWS Security Groups are stateful for outbound AND inbound traffic?

item.title: AWS Launches Amazon GuardDuty
item.description: Did you know AWS launched Amazon GuardDuty? This is a threat detection service which analyses events from AWS CloudTrail, VPC Flow Logs and more.
